priority_actions.title: Critical: Deferred Content
priority_actions.description: Lecture 3 ran long, deferring critical topics: Data Preparation, Understanding, and Documentation. This is a gap for student projects.

priority_actions.title: Plan: Lecture 4
priority_actions.description: Your next lecture, 'Project Proposals', is upcoming. Don't forget to upload your slides for analysis.

sustains: Students love when you pause mid-lecture to check for understanding.
Real-world examples for 'GLMs' were highly effective across all classes.
improves: Connection between lecture topics and assignment questions could be clearer.
Pacing at the end of lectures tends to accelerate.
